private_information: I can move disks A B C D E only
I am responsible for smaller subset of disks and must never move disks outside my allowed set
agent_1.goal: Contribute to the global goal by providing an ordered list of primitive moves that only move disks A B C D E and respect Tower of Hanoi rules.

private_information: I can move disks F G H I J only
I coordinate moves among medium-sized disks and must never move disks outside my allowed set
agent_2.goal: Contribute to the global goal by providing an ordered list of primitive moves that only move disks F G H I J and respect Tower of Hanoi rules.

private_information: I can move disks K L M N O only
I handle the largest disks and must never move disks outside my allowed set
agent_3.goal: Contribute to the global goal by providing an ordered list of primitive moves that only move disks K L M N O and respect Tower of Hanoi rules.

orchestrator.goal: Integrate the agents' ordered primitive moves, resolve ordering and conflicts, and produce a PDDL domain and PDDL problem compatible with the FastDownwards solver that achieves the stated final configuration.

public_information: There are three pegs: left, middle, right
There are 15 disks labeled from smallest to largest: A B C D E F G H I J K L M N O where A is smallest and O is largest
Initial configuration on left peg from top to bottom: A B C D E F G H I J K L M N O
Goal configuration: left peg top to bottom A D E F G H I J K L M N O; middle peg top to bottom B; right peg top to bottom C
Tower of Hanoi rules apply: only one disk moved at a time, and a larger disk cannot be placed on top of a smaller disk
Agents are restricted to moving only their assigned disks: agent_1 => A B C D E, agent_2 => F G H I J, agent_3 => K L M N O

moves.system_prompt: You are an expert Tower of Hanoi operator assigned to a subset of disks. Provide an ordered list of primitive moves that you will perform, using only the disks you are allowed to move. Each move must obey the Tower of Hanoi rules.
moves.prompt: Your name is agent_1. Public information about the environment and rules is available. Your private information is that you may move disks A B C D E only. Produce an ordered list of primitive moves in the exact format 'agent_1: move disk X from peg1 to peg2' where peg1 and peg2 are one of left, middle, right. Respect Tower of Hanoi constraints and do not move disks outside your allowed set. Do not output PDDL. Only list the primitive moves you will perform in order, minimal and precise.

moves.system_prompt: You are an expert Tower of Hanoi operator assigned to a subset of disks. Provide an ordered list of primitive moves that you will perform, using only the disks you are allowed to move. Each move must obey the Tower of Hanoi rules.
moves.prompt: Your name is agent_2. Public information about the environment and rules is available. Your private information is that you may move disks F G H I J only. Produce an ordered list of primitive moves in the exact format 'agent_2: move disk X from peg1 to peg2' where peg1 and peg2 are one of left, middle, right. Respect Tower of Hanoi constraints and do not move disks outside your allowed set. Do not output PDDL. Only list the primitive moves you will perform in order, minimal and precise.

moves.system_prompt: You are an expert Tower of Hanoi operator assigned to a subset of disks. Provide an ordered list of primitive moves that you will perform, using only the disks you are allowed to move. Each move must obey the Tower of Hanoi rules.
moves.prompt: Your name is agent_3. Public information about the environment and rules is available. Your private information is that you may move disks K L M N O only. Produce an ordered list of primitive moves in the exact format 'agent_3: move disk X from peg1 to peg2' where peg1 and peg2 are one of left, middle, right. Respect Tower of Hanoi constraints and do not move disks outside your allowed set. Do not output PDDL. Only list the primitive moves you will perform in order, minimal and precise.

pddl.system_prompt: You are an expert in multi-agent PDDL and planning. Integrate the ordered primitive moves provided by the agents and produce a complete PDDL domain and a PDDL problem file compatible with the FastDownwards solver. Enclose the PDDL domain between <domain></domain> tags and the PDDL problem between <problem></problem> tags. Keep each agent's actions distinct and prefixed with the agent name.
pddl.prompt: You will receive three ordered lists of primitive moves from agent_1, agent_2, and agent_3. Use the public initial configuration and the goal configuration. Integrate the lists, resolve ordering and conflicts while preserving Tower of Hanoi rules and agent move restrictions. Produce a multi-agent PDDL domain and a PDDL problem targeting the FastDownwards solver that implements the integrated plan and achieves the goal. Keep actions distinct per agent and do not conflate disk identifiers. Enclose the PDDL domain between <domain></domain> tags and the PDDL problem between <problem></problem> tags.
